QTS Transformation to Angle-Axis Time Series

Source: R/qts-transformations.R
qts2aats.Rd

This function converts a quaternion time series into its angle-axis representation.

Usage

qts2aats(x)

Arguments

x

An object of class qts.

Value

A time series stored as a tibble::tibble with columns time, angle, ux, uy and uz containing the angle-axis representation of the input quaternions.

Examples

qts2aats(vespa64$igp[[1]])
#> # A tibble: 101 × 5
#>     time angle    ux    uy     uz
#>    <int> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1     0 0.214 0.746 0.654 0.125 
#>  2     1 0.203 0.735 0.666 0.129 
#>  3     2 0.191 0.725 0.676 0.133 
#>  4     3 0.178 0.718 0.683 0.133 
#>  5     4 0.167 0.714 0.689 0.128 
#>  6     5 0.157 0.713 0.691 0.119 
#>  7     6 0.147 0.716 0.690 0.105 
#>  8     7 0.140 0.726 0.683 0.0837
#>  9     8 0.132 0.739 0.671 0.0554
#> 10     9 0.125 0.758 0.652 0.0201
#> # ℹ 91 more rows
